channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins batch task Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins batch task Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-23115|2024-08-03T03:36:19.192Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20batch%20task%20plugin
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Jenkins batch task Plugin 1.19 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to retrieve logs, build or delete a batch task.
